<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass changes code to work around Cortex-A53 erratum 835769</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It works around it by inserting a nop instruction in code sequences that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in some circumstances may trigger the erratum.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It inserts a nop instruction between a sequence of the following 2 classes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of instructions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instr 1: mem-instr (including loads, stores and prefetches).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instr 2: non-SIMD integer multiply-accumulate writing 64-bit X registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Erratum cannot be triggered when the destination register is 32 bits,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AArch64::UMSUBLrrr:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Erratum can only be triggered by multiply-adds, not by regular</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-accumulating multiplies, i.e. when Ra=XZR=&#39;11111&#39;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Iterate through fallen through blocks trying to find a previous non-pseudo if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there is one, otherwise return nullptr. Only look for instructions in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// previous blocks, not the current block, since we only use this to look at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// previous blocks.</span></CodeLine>
